channel.title: [pi] client freezing when clicking quest tab button
channel.description: I recently made a custom quest. When i click the quest in the quest tab before i start it, it works fine However, once i start it and click, my client freezes and i get this error: [code]InsidiaX is loading.. Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded Compressed Models.. Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 sendPacket185(29172) sendPacket185(29172) sendPacket185(29172) Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8217 at RSFont.getTextWidth(RSFont.java:90) at RSFont.method382(RSFont.java:75) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10361) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10139) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:10914) at client.method146(client.java:14914) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9952) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10847) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6095) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: [pi] client freezing when clicking quest tab button
item.dc:creator: @Weasey Weasey
item.description:
@Weasey wrote:


Look on line 8217 and find what you did wrong, should be an easy fix

Look on line 8217 and find what you did wrong, should be an easy fix

item.title: [pi] client freezing when clicking quest tab button

item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

I recently made a custom quest. When i click the quest in the quest tab before i start it, it works fine However, once i start it and click, my client freezes and i get this error:

InsidiaX is loading.. Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded Compressed Models.. Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 sendPacket185(29172) sendPacket185(29172) sendPacket185(29172) Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8217 at RSFont.getTextWidth(RSFont.java:90) at RSFont.method382(RSFont.java:75) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10361) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10139) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:10914) at client.method146(client.java:14914) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9952) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10847) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6095) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
